tool_description: Validates and retrieves payment status information for orders including transaction details and authorization status.

order_id.description: Order identifier to check payment status

payment_method.description: Payment method to validate: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, bank_transfer, digital_wallet

error_messages: Order not found: The provided order_id does not exist in the system. Verify the order identifier is correct.
Invalid payment method: Payment method must be one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, bank_transfer, digital_wallet].
Payment system unavailable: Unable to access payment processing system. Retry after a brief delay.
No payment information: No payment data found for the specified order.
usage: Provide order_id to retrieve payment status. Optionally specify payment_method to validate a specific payment type.

order_id.description: The order identifier that was validated

payment_status.description: Current payment status (pending, authorized, captured, failed, refunded, cancelled)

payment_method.description: Payment method used for the order

last_payment_update.description: Timestamp of the last payment status update
